THINKS: The website's usability is confusing and not intuitive enough for new users.
There should be an easier way to access important features like event registrations and committee information.
The current design of the website does not effectively guide users to the information they need.
Other users share my frustrations but may not voice them.
Improvements could enhance the overall user experience and encourage more engagement.
DOES: Primarily uses the app for event registrations and information access.
Relies on the calendar feature to plan and keep track of upcoming events.
Navigates the website to find committee descriptions and member directories.
Uses trial and error to figure out how to navigate the website.
Discusses usability issues with peers and seeks advice on navigating the site.
FEELS: Frustrated by the complexity and lack of visibility of certain website features.
Confused when trying to navigate between the public and admin views.
Anxious about not being able to find necessary information quickly, which may impact their participation.
Encouraged when they find features that are user-friendly like the app, but disappointed when the website doesn't match that experience.
Skeptical about whether changes will actually improve usability for themselves and others.
